overview: José Raúl Ramírez explains the way an electrical organ works and – more than forty years before he recorded his work – plays a selection of "danzas" on the organ, including "Felices días" by Morel Campos and "Tus caricias" by José Enrique Pedreira.

production_companies.name: Film Unit of the Division of Community Education, Puerto Rico

title: Danzas puertorriqueñas
